text:
rOpenSci's next Social Coworking and office hours is coming up :tada:

These are casual online events for coworking and socializing, generally centered on a theme related to R and tools for open/reproducible science.
You can work quietly on your own, join in a discussion, or work while listening to the discussion, whatever suits you (and you don't have to follow the theme).

:grey_exclamation: Theme: Let it go!
:hourglass_flowing_sand: When: Tuesday, January 13th, 09:00 Americas Pacific (17:00 UTC)
:cookie: Hosted by: Steffi LaZerte and cohost Yanina Bellini Saibene (me)
:mag: Details: <https://ropensci.org/events/coworking-2026-01>

You can use this time for...
- General coworking
- Spend some time reviewing the forums, Slack workspaces, Newsletters, RSS feeds (etc. etc.) you're subscribed to
- Unsubscribe to all you no longer need (Let it go!)
- Chat with me :slightly_smiling_face: and other attendees about our theme!

attachments.fallback: Social Coworking and Office Hours - Let it go!
attachments.text: Take some time with us to review what you can let go in your digital life!
attachments.title: Social Coworking and Office Hours - Let it go!
